nocodb-create-record.description: Creates a new record in the given table.

nocodb-delete-record.description: Deletes a record with the given Record ID.

nocodb-get-record.description: Gets a record by the Record ID.

nocodb-search-records.description: Returns a list of records matching the where condition.

props.name: whereCondition
props.description: Enables you to define specific conditions for filtering records.See docs [here](https://docs.nocodb.com/0.109.7/developer-resources/rest-apis/#comparison-operators).

props.name: limit
props.description: Enables you to set a limit on the number of records you want to retrieve.

props.name: sort
props.description: Comma separated field names without space.Example: **field1,-field2** will sort the records first by 'field1' in ascending order and then by 'field2' in descending order.

nocodb-update-record.description: Updates an existing record with the given Record ID.
